short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Polar Bear wallpaper turn new tab to custom HD Polar Bear background. Polar Bear wallpaper background theme for animal fans

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Automatically shuffle Polar Bear wallpapers with every new tab.  
2. Choose random Polar Bear backgrounds or mark favorites in the wallpaper selection panel.  
3. Custom search bar.  
4. Quick links to your emails and social media accounts.  
5. Displays the current date and time automatically.  
6. Add notes to keep track of your tasks.  
7. Convenient access to your most visited websites.  
8. Direct access to your bookmarks.  
9. Save websites to the Shortcut panel for faster navigation.  
10. Quick links to Google apps.  
11. Explore additional themes easily.  
12. Simple sharing options for social media.  
13. Download wallpapers with a single click.  
14. Instant access to play games.  
15. Enable fun animations like snow, rain, falling leaves, or fireworks in the Polar Bear new tab.
